source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT distinct cast(settlement_date_key as date) as settlement_date  FROM [Audit].[vw_load_settlement_date]

properties.description: Pipeline to produce the billing file for Insights Center
Client Pipleline moves data from consolidatedDw client information to springboard client
Account Pipleline moves data from consolidatedDw Account and misc information to springboard account
Cardholder Pipleline moves data from consolidatedDw cardholder and their email with account misc information to springboard cardholder
Pipeline to ingest the manual Invalid BIN spreadsheet

activities.description: loads data from STG table into [TRANSACTION].[FraudTransaction]

activities.description: loads data from STG table into [TRANSACTION].[FraudTransaction]

activities.name: VisaChargeback_FrTransaction Merge Latest to Stage
activities.description: This pipeline is to move the  Visachargeback file from Raw to Stage for Fraud transaction/Heatmap dashboard

activities.name: MDMRTN Reference file from Raw to stage
MDMBIN Reference file from Raw to stage
MDMClient Reference file from Raw to stage

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select name as table_name
from sys.tables
where schema_name(schema_id) = 'rewards'  and  name like 'kobie_transaction%'

select * from [rewards].[@{item().table_name}]
order by externalID, case when recordtype = '001' then 0
              when recordtype = '101' then 1
  when recordtype = '102' then 2
  when recordtype = '103' then 3
  when recordtype = '104' then 4
  when recordtype = '002' then 5
end

select name as table_name
from sys.tables
where schema_name(schema_id) = 'rewards'  and  name like 'kobie_demographic%'

select * from [rewards].[@{item().table_name}]
order by [externalAccountID] , cardNumber,
case when recordtype = '001' then 0
              when recordtype = '201' then 1
  when recordtype = '202' then 2
  when recordtype = '203' then 3
  when recordtype = '204' then 4
  when recordtype = '002' then 5
end

properties.description: This is the pipeline that populates the Client, BIN, and RTN dimensions from the MDM View.
This pipeline populates Dim_Business_Partner from the source file.

activities.name: execPL_Raw2Stage_Latest_DimBusinessPartner
activities.description: Execute pipeline to copy the latest Dim Business Partner source file from Raw into Stage

activities.name: Copy_stage2DW_dim_business_partner
activities.description: Copy data from the staged file to stage.dim_business_partner in DW

activities.name: sp_dim_business_partner_load
activities.description: Execute stored procedure s_dim_business_partner_load which loads data from state to final target

activities.name: Copy_DWtoSBDM_dim_business_partner
activities.description: Copy dim_business_partner data from DW to SharedBranchDM
